definitions.definition: something that it is your job or duty to deal with:
examples: [ + to infinitive ] It's her responsibility to ensure the project finishes on time.

definitions.definition: to be in a position of authority over someone and to have a duty to make certain that particular things are done:
to have a duty to work for or help someone who is in a position of authority over you:
examples: The company says it cannot cut its prices any more because it has a responsibility to its shareholders.
